channel.title: Okay. i need exact answers. I Vain I if your reading this help
channel.description: okay. first. how could i make my 317 have automatic membership via paypal? secondly, how can i make some skills members only. to change donator to members would i have to rename everything to members? or are their compiled files that have it as donator. thanks

item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:1, topic:375427”][quote author=Pzezima2 link=topic=471357.msg3447469#msg3447469 date=1293520776]
dont answer if you have no answer.
[/quote]
Go away.[/quote]

eat me.

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:9, topic:375400”]Also, I would take a look at the OneBip automatic donations tutorials which can be found by using Google. This could help you and also be a nice feature as well.

[quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=471357.msg3447656#msg3447656 date=1293534077]

first off switching doners to members is against the TOS. The member idea is Jagex and they will fight back hard. 1 year ago i attempted this and 2 weeks later i get a letter form jagex’s Lawyer attempting to press charges.

For the fact of it shows you are in it for money, not educational purposes. Kinda hard to get money out of someone when all they want is knowledge, ya know?

@TOPIC
1 > You will need to setup a script to monitor your paypal account,a and when payments come it, handing them out accordingly.
2 > Just make it so you cannot gain any XP without having a membership?
3 > Just rename the donator status to member, bout it. Unless you feel like adding a completely new rank.
[/quote][/quote]

thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay. i need exact answers. I Vain I if your reading this help
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

Quite simply off the top of my head, I can think of a tedious way of doing this. By which when someone starts playing your server, they are given the rights of a free member (value == 0). Then as they move on and can access members features after they pay to become a member (switch the value == 1). So If you want to teleport to camelot, and you only want to members to do so, make sure the value is = to 1 with a simple if statement. Of course this is a tedious way of doing this, I’m sure there are better ways of doing this.

Read full topic
